TopicTitle: Im looking for a certain ship, so i may ask for the craft file

Articles.Content: Im looking for a ship i seen in here somewhere that he was able to haul up 4 lunar cars at once. I cant find it again, so any help would be great. Thanks in advance.

There are probably hundreds of designs that fit your description, could you make it more accurate?

Also, why don't you just build it yourself? It really isn't that hard once you get the basics.
What i remember it had 4 in a circle around the top of the space craft, and he could drop them off one at a time, and the things i make usually kill kerbals.

... and the things i make usually kill kerbals.

Thats fine... its part of their job, kinda )
